EmailTemplate.description: Manufacturers for Industrial Gloves and Apparel made with DuPont™ Kevlar® Fibers
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Manufacturers for Industrial Gloves and Apparel DuPont™ Kevlar® Fibers
EmailTemplate.subject: Manufacturers of Yarns made with DuPont™ Kevlar® Fibers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Kevlar® Gloves and Apparel.
DuPont manufactures the fiber. Customers take our product to manufacture Kevlar® gloves and apparel.
Below is the web address of a list of the companies that manufacture Kevlar® gloves and apparel.
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=5&prodNum=5
Thank you for your visit to DuPont websites which provide additional information about Nomex®, Kevlar®, Tyvek® and other DuPont products.
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
